title: Project A
description: This project was made to explore different APIs and learn how to handle JSON data.

title: Project B
description: This project was built to learn how to use the Leaflet library, logging workouts anywhere in the world.

title: Project C
description: This project was created as a main page concept for a bank, exploring the benefits of a modern interface.

title: Project D
description: This project simulates a banking platform with login protection, allowing users to send and receive transfers, request loans, and check account status.

title: Project E
description: This is a two-player dice game where the player with the highest score wins.

title: Project F
description: This is a number guessing game based on scoring.
